problem.markdown:
1. The percentage of energy to be considered for evaluating MRR is ( ) 10% ( ) 25% ( ) 50% (x) 70-75%
2. Which one of the following is a point heat source model ( ) Snoyes (x) Dibitonto ( ) Beck’s ( ) Vandick
3. The percentage of energy to be considered for evaluating MRR is not 50% in which of the following model (x) Dibitonto ( ) Vandick ( ) Snoyes ( ) Beck’s
4. The shape of the crater obtained is considered to be parabolid by 10% ( ) Snoyes ( ) Vandick (x) Salonitis ( ) Beck’s
5. Question text5. Which one of the following thermal model considers surface roughness approach ( ) Vandick ( ) Dibitonto ( ) Jilani (x) Salonitis
